title: The Omnipotent

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Gain the ability of one role from every faction

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may only use each ability once
-You do not gain the drawbacks of the ability
-You won’t get “duplicate” abilities, such as a veteran and a Medusa’s abilities
-Any immunities a role has, you will get when using that ability
-If at any point a faction is created mid-game while you have this role, you will gain the ability of the first role of that faction instantly

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Overpower the town, and prove your worth

desc:
Post 2837
_I’ve reached godhood. My only limitation is myself_
